sentences.sentence: The solid fuel consumption of sinter has been decreased greatly through insisting on using high-quality calces.
sentences.translation: 通过坚持使用高质量的生石灰，大大降低了烧结矿的固体燃料消耗。

sentences.sentence: A kind of plastic theory of sinter is presented in this article.
sentences.translation: 本文提出了一种烧结体塑性理论。

sentences.sentence: A fine coal fired ignition system used in sinter plant No. 2672 is described.
sentences.translation: 介绍了2672烧结厂烧结机上采用的煤粉点火器系统。
